description: Link errors have been detected on port 2 and it is operating in a degraded performance state.

eventDetails.eventItemValue: Power off any affected server profiles. Perform a hard reset of the interconnect. If problem persists, incrementally replace the hardware until the problem goes away. First try replacing the IO adapter in slot 2 of {"name":"CZJ9260730, bay 7","uri":"/rest/drive-enclosures/CN700310NX"}. If problem persists, try replacing the SAS connection module. If problem persists, try replacing the chassis of {"name":"CZJ9260730, bay 7","uri":"/rest/drive-enclosures/CN700310NX"}. If problem persists, try replacing the midplane of {"name":"CZJ9260730","uri":"/rest/enclosures/797740CZJ9260730"}. If the problem still persists, contact your authorized support representative and provide them with a support dump.
